sentences.english: He graduated from Xi'an international university , the Department of Foreign Languages English majors.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於西安外事學院，外語系英語專業。

sentences.english: It looks like the drums in Drum Tower in Xi'An.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去很像西安鼓樓裏的鼓。

sentences.english: W: I’d like to go to Xi’an and Guilin.
Field observations were carried out at dozens of crosswalks in Xi an.
sentences.chinese: 在西安市選取了數十條人行橫道進行實地觀測。

sentences.english: All exhibitors are welcome to take part in the International Competition and Awarding held by the organizer.
sentences.chinese: 所有參展方均可參與西安世園會國際競賽及評獎。

sentences.english: We are on the train from Xi'an to Tianshui.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在乘搭火車衝從西安到天水。

sentences.english: In 1989 he graduated from the Xian Academy of Fine Arts with a degree in oil painting.
sentences.chinese: 1989年畢業於西安美院油畫系，獲得學士學位。

sentences.english: Xi'an City Wall dates back to the Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 西安古城牆始建於明朝。

sentences.english: Secondly， I would like to try the local delicacies of Xi’an.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我希望品嚐一下西安的地方美食。

sentences.english: Can also enjoy to imitate Tang's music and song and dances in Xian, taste article Tang's vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 在西安還可以欣賞到仿唐音樂和歌舞，嘗品唐菜。

sentences.english: Xi'an city wall is an artificial loess slope composed of inner-soil and outer-brick masonry.
sentences.chinese: 西安明城牆是由內芯土和外包牆組成的人工黃土邊坡。

sentences.english: In Wenchuan Earthquake, Xi'an city and Baoji city in Shaanxi Province are in areas with large epicentral distance.
sentences.chinese: 汶川地震中，陝西省西安市和寶雞市兩地處於遠震區。

sentences.english: The winner of the men's competition was a 40-year-old man from Xi'an.
sentences.chinese: 男子組比賽的冠軍是一位來自西安的四十歲的男子。

sentences.english: The Bell Tower in Xi'an was not only built earlier, but also taller than any other in the country.
sentences.chinese: 因而西安的鐘樓不但修的早，而且也修得高大雄偉。

sentences.english: The transport sector will Silverstrand Fu Xian Xianyang paragraph to carry out special maintenance training.
sentences.chinese: 交通部門將對福銀線西安至咸陽段進行專項維修整治。

sentences.english: To Xi'an, it is your paradise here.
sentences.chinese: 來西安吧這裏纔是你的天堂。
